articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: Netflix’s 3 Body Problem review: an solid debut that could go deeper - The Verge
articles.description: Netflix’s 3 Body Problem — out March 21st — from executive producers David Benioff, D. B. Weiss, and Alexander Woo could stand to dig a little deeper.
articles.content:
Though David Benioff, D. B. Weiss, and Alexander Woos 3 Body Problem is impressive, it really feels like just an introduction to Cixin Lius deeper ideas.
ByCharles Pulliam-Moore, a reporter focusing… [+7960 chars]
